ygData.subject: Re: Predaking
ygData.msgSnippet: Headstrong starts to pace around, clenching his fists. Snort* this is stupid, hurhhhh, we should be doing something important he says almost accusingly,

Subject: Re: Predaking
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

Headstrong starts to pace around, clenching his fists. "Snort* this is
stupid, hurhhhh, we should be doing something important" he says almost
accusingly, pointing a finger at Razorclaw. Tantrum just stands around,
arms crossed, waiting for an order.


Megatron notices the small beep on his body comunicator. The Maximals were
obviously busy, so he might as well check it. He responds to Razorclaw,
"Razorclaw, I have found a group of Decepticons, and have taken leadership.
You know most of them already, but you can be of use. Head to these
coordinates right now, and wait for a signal. The robot Autofire is your
leader, so listen to him and do not get Detected Understand?". He then
turns all of his attention to the screen again, "Now it gets interesting
Switchblade, we see how the Maximals react." Motormaster walks into the
room, and walks over to Cyclonus, taking interest in the screen.
